New Records: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest international goal after seven seconds
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz made a long-range effort for his first international goal
Kylian Mbappé forced a fine save from Germany's Marc-André ter Stegen
Jamal Musiala picked out Kai Havertz with a cross for the second goal
Pre-Game Insights: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann was desperate for a good start to the year ahead of the tournament on home soil in June
Post-Match Reflections: France coach Didier Deschamps said the Germans played a high level match today
Germany's Julian Nagelsmann said they got a confidence boost from this game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Groupama Stadium in Lyon, France
The referee was Jesús Gil Manzano
Others: Germany play the Netherlands on Tuesday when France face Chile
